attributes.Name: Popcorn
attributes.Descriptio: Popcorn is a stall that sells popcorn. Homer, Bart and Lisa passed this stall while they had their walk at Squidport.

attributes.Name: Fresh Squeezed Lemonade
attributes.Descriptio: Fresh Squeezed Lemonade is a stall that sells lemonade. Homer, Bart and Lisa passed this stall while they had their walk at Squidport.

attributes.Name: Malaria Zone
attributes.Descriptio: Malaria Zone is a restaurant with an explorer theme

attributes.Name: Just Rainsticks
attributes.Descriptio: Just Rainsticks is a store that sells rainsticks. It is one of many shops

attributes.Name: Hot Dogs
attributes.Descriptio: Hot Dogs is a stall that sells hot dogs. Due to the "truth in board walking" law, a seller had to shout true information about his hot dogs, which were "not so hot dogs" and "cold and droopy."

attributes.Name: Planet Hype
attributes.Descriptio: Planet Hype (a.k.a. Planet Springfield) is an over-hyped, overly trendy movie-themed restaurant located at the Springfield Squidport. It specializes in breakfast-cereal-encrusted meats, such as the Krusty-O Chicken. Rainier Wolfcastle is frequently seen

attributes.Name: The Frying Dutchman
attributes.Descriptio: The Frying Dutchman, owned by Captain Horatio McCallister, is a seafood restaurant in Springfield.

attributes.Name: Duff Stadium
attributes.Descriptio: Duff Stadium (later renamed Isotope Stadium) is the stadium where the Springfield Isotopes play baseball. Homer held his hunger strikes here when he learned the Isotopes were moving to Albuquerque. The Isotopes were considered a rubbish team until they w

attributes.Name: Krustylu Studios
attributes.Descriptio: Krustylu Studios is the television studio in Springfield in which the Krusty the Klown Show is recorded. It is located either in or in the vicinity of the Channel 6 studio lot. The lot is located across the street from a box factory

attributes.Name: Channel 6 Studios
attributes.Descriptio: Channel 6 is Springfield's most popular TV channel. Its studio is located next to the Springfield Box Factory and adjacent to Krustylu Studios. Kent Brockman presents the news programmes for the channel. The channel also presents a number of children's s

attributes.Name: Sleep-Eazy Motel
attributes.Descriptio: The Sleep-Eazy Motel is a seedy motel in Springfield. The building itself is deteriorating and prostitutes hang outside the lobby.

attributes.Name: Springfield Retirement Castle
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Retirement Castle, sometimes called Springfield Retirement Home, is a location located at 2001 Creaking Oak Drive. It is Springfield's retirement home for the elderly.

attributes.Name: Duff Beer Party Bus
attributes.Descriptio: Duff Beer Party Bus, formerly known as the Duff Partymobile, is a party bus owned by Duff Beer.

attributes.Name: Springfield Downs
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Downs, also known as the Springfield Dog Track, is a dog and horse racing track in Springfield. The mechanized rabbit is called Shirley.

attributes.Name: Springfield Coliseum
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Coliseum is a large venue located in Springfield. Its name is an obvious reference to the Colosseum in Rome. It appears to be a place where concerts are performed.

attributes.Name: Duff Blimp
attributes.Descriptio: The Duff Blimp is a blimp with the Duff beer logo on it. It could possibly be based on the real life Goodyear Blimp. The Blimp is usually piloted by Duffman, sometimes other people fly it.

attributes.Name: Springfield Cementery
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Cemetery is where Springfield buries its dead; it's next to the Springfield Pet Cemetery and in front of the Springfield General Hospital

attributes.Name: Kwik-E-Mart
attributes.Descriptio: The Kwik-E-Mart is a convenience store in Springfield, managed by Apu Nahasapeemapetilon. It is run mostly by Apu, but occasionally Sanjay helps. In many future predictions, his several kids all have roles in the maintenance of the Kwik-E-Mart.

attributes.Name: O'Flanagan's Pub
attributes.Descriptio: O'Flanagan's Pub is a bar in Dunkilderry, Ireland that has existed since World War II. It is owned and named after Tom O'Flanagan. When Grampa was young and he used to come to the pub, it was really popular: people danced and sang at the pub. The Simpson

attributes.Name: Herman's Military Antiques
attributes.Descriptio: Herman's Military Antiques (Formerly Pet Shop) is a war memorabilia store in downtown Springfield. In Bart the General, Bart enlists the help of Herman, the store's one-armed owner, in waging war on Nelson Muntz. In Old Money, Abe spends $400 of Beatrice

attributes.Name: Moe's Tavern
attributes.Descriptio: Moe's Tavern, or simply called Moe's, is the local tavern in Springfield. The bar is named after its owner: Moe Szyslak. It is the only known tavern in Springfield, though there is a Joe's Tavern in Shelbyville.

attributes.Name: The Evil House
attributes.Descriptio: The Evil House (also known as the Bad Dream House) is a house built on an Indian Burial Ground that the Simpsons family moved into in the first Treehouse of Horror special. The Evil House is one of the very things to not only be a location, but also a ch

attributes.Name: Sprawl-Mart
attributes.Descriptio: Sprawl-Mart is a department store in Springfield, both Abe and Homer have worked there as greeters. Sprawl-Mart is visited by Homer when he and the kids go shopping for a Mother's Day present for Marge.

attributes.Name: Lugash's Gym
attributes.Descriptio: Lugash's Gym is a gymnastic gym owned by Lugash. Carrey, Tina and Lisa go to do gymnastic here.

attributes.Name: Aztec Theater
attributes.Descriptio: The Aztec Theater is one of the major movie theatres in Springfield. In contrast to Springfield Googolplex Theatres' thirty or more screens, the Aztec can only screen one movie at a time; however, it has premiered many installments of the Space Mutants f

attributes.Name: Skip's Diner
attributes.Descriptio: Skip's Diner is a restaurant located in Downtown Springfield, next to Comic Book Guy's store, The Android's Dungeon.

attributes.Name: Jake's Unisex Hair Palace
attributes.Descriptio: Jake's Unisex Barbershop is a barbershop in Springfield that often changes name. It is run by Jake who appears to be aging.

attributes.Name: Springfield General Hospital
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield General Hospital, also known as Marvin Monroe Memorial Hospital, is the main hospital in Springfield. Dr. Hibbert and Dr. Nick Riviera work there.

attributes.Name: Adult Education Annex
attributes.Descriptio: Adult Education Annex is an education facility in Springfield. Homer Simpson goes here and teaches a class about the secrets of a successful marriage, but fails, and puts his marriage on the rocks after him and Marge's secrets go public.

attributes.Name: The Swanky Fish
attributes.Descriptio: The Swanky Fish is a Japanese restaurant located in downtown Springfield. Marge and Homer have been here to have a fancy lunch together, but it ended in Marge getting mad and running out. Akira is also seen working there.

attributes.Name: Asia de Cuba
attributes.Descriptio: Asia de Cuba is a restaurant that Homer and Marge have dined at. It is known to be rather pricey. It is known that they serve roast beef and wine. Also it has a signature view of Springfield. They also have a buffet table and a chocolate fountain.

attributes.Name: The Pimento Grove
attributes.Descriptio: The Pimento Grove is a fine dining restaurant in Springfield. It is the restaurant of choice for many local and visiting celebrities. There are framed photos of many of them lining the walls of the dining room, with the exception of Troy McClure's, which

attributes.Name: Old Springfield Library
attributes.Descriptio: The Old Springfield Library is Springfield's main library. This library has very old books like diaries and calendars, unlike the Springfield Public Library. Lisa visits this library often. The library has changed designs, going from grey to red.

attributes.Name: Springfield Police Station
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Police Station is the base of the Springfield Police Department. It contains several prison cells, a front desk, a small museum of crime, the Chief's office and a car park for the Police Cruisers. Homer once crashed his car into the front

attributes.Name: Springfield Town Hall
attributes.Descriptio: Springfield Town Hall at the Springfield Town Square is where town meetings are held to discuss various issues, including taxing and improving Springfield. Such disuccions include the Monorail, recent tremors and general crazy ideas it is also where The

attributes.Name: The Android's Dungeon and Baseball Card Shop
attributes.Descriptio: The Android's Dungeon and Baseball Card Shop is a comic book shop in Springfield run by Comic Book Guy that is located in Springfield Town Square.

attributes.Name: King Toot's Music Store
attributes.Descriptio:
King Toot's Music Store is Springfield's premier music store. It sells instruments of all kinds, and is located right next to Moe's Tavern.

Lisa got both her saxophones from the store. Homer got Lisa's saxophone reed from here for Lisa's recital, only

attributes.Name: Try-N-Save
attributes.Descriptio: The shop sells a variety of products, including stationery, video games, toys, and jewelry, and it has a photo center. They have small kiddie rides outside, a horse and car.

attributes.Name: Zesty's
attributes.Descriptio: Zesty's is a restaurant that serves pizza and subs, one of many shops that line the Town Square. Zesty's is noted for having the world's first crustless pizza.

attributes.Name: The Java Server
attributes.Descriptio: The Java Server is an Internet café in Springfield. It was advertised in the magazine Wired. The day of its opening it was the sight of a robbery by Snake, who stole money from Homer's bank account to his computer.

attributes.Name: Springfield Penitentiary
attributes.Descriptio: Springfield Penitentiary is the main prison in Springfield.

attributes.Name: Santa's Village
attributes.Descriptio: Santa's Village is a Christmas-themed amusement park in Springfield. Despite that, the park is open all year. Santa's Village boast real-life reindeer as its main attraction (although they are often sleeping in the day uncomfortably due to not being able

attributes.Name: The Springfield Tire Yard
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Tire Yard, colloquially known as the Springfield Tire Fire, is a lot where tires are disposed of and then burned. The fire that the yard holds has become more iconic than the yard itself, making it somewhat of a landmark in the town, as d

attributes.Name: Krusty Burger
attributes.Descriptio: Krusty Burger is a fast-food burger restaurant chain that was founded by Krusty the Clown in Springfield. It's known to use a variety of animal meats in it, without any of them being what one would normally eat, including zoo animals, road kill and insec

attributes.Name: Elementary School
attributes.Descriptio: Springfield Elementary School is an elementary school which Bart Simpson, Lisa Simpson, and many other children of Springfield, such as Nelson Muntz, Janey Powell, Jimbo, Martin Prince, Ralph Wiggum and Milhouse Van Houten attend.

attributes.Name: Burns Manor
attributes.Descriptio: Burns Manor is Mr. Burns mansion where he resides. It used to host the Springfield Nuclear Power Plant Annual Picnic.

attributes.Name: Fat Tony's house
attributes.Descriptio: Fat Tony's house is very large like a mansion and has lots of expensive statues. The address is 5C International waters road.

attributes.Name: Springfield Community Center
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Community Center is a building the town of Springfield uses for recreational events.

attributes.Name: Duff Brewery
attributes.Descriptio: The Duff Brewery in Springfield and Capital City is the place where Duff Beer is made. The tour of the brewery is very popular. Most visitors to the Duff Brewery leave with a greater-than-16 blood-alcohol level, due to the copious amounts of free beer sa

attributes.Name: Howard's Flowers
attributes.Descriptio: Howard's Flowers is a flower shop in Springfield. Its roses are so expensive that Homer buys just one rose for Marge.[1] Howard, the owner and florist of Howard's Flowers, died in 1999 and was replaced by his son.

attributes.Name: Phineas Q. Butterfat's Ice Cream Parlor
attributes.Descriptio: The Phineas Q. Butterfat's Ice Cream Parlor is an ice cream shop in Springfield. It sells sodas, sundaes, and shakes. Jeremy Freedman also works there.

attributes.Name: Springfield Nuclear Power Plant
attributes.Descriptio: The Springfield Nuclear Power Plant is a nuclear power plant owned by Mr. Burns and is the main source of power in Springfield.

attributes.Name: Fort Sensible
attributes.Descriptio: Fort Sensible is a historical building located in Olde Springfield Towne.

attributes.Name: 742 Evergreen Terrace
attributes.Descriptio: 742 Evergreen Terrace is the street address of the Simpson family home. It was revealed that Grampa Abe Simpson actually owns 742 Evergreen Terrace. He sold his old house, and wrote Homer a check for $15,000 so that he could pay for the home.

attributes.Name: 744 Evergreen Terrace
attributes.Descriptio: 744 Evergreen Terrace is the address of the house where the Flanders family live. The house is a two-story detached house with a connected garage.
